### Type of Change
<!-- Check all that apply -->
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Configuration or infrastructure change
- [ ] Other (please describe):

## Transparency & Honesty Framework Checklist

### Code Integrity
- [ ] All commits are properly signed (if applicable)
- [ ] Commit messages clearly describe the changes
- [ ] No sensitive data (passwords, keys, tokens) included
- [ ] Code follows project standards and guidelines
- [ ] Changes are well-documented in code comments

### Testing & Verification
- [ ] All automated checks pass
- [ ] Code has been tested locally
- [ ] New tests added for new functionality
- [ ] Existing tests updated if necessary
- [ ] Manual testing performed (describe below)

### Documentation
- [ ] README updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Documentation updated (if applicable)
- [ ] API documentation updated (if applicable)
- [ ] CHANGELOG updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Comments added for complex logic

### Transparency
- [ ] Changes are clearly explained in this PR description
- [ ] Related issues are linked
- [ ] Breaking changes are clearly documented
- [ ] Migration path provided (if applicable)
- [ ] Impact on existing users considered and documented

### Attribution
- [ ] All contributors properly credited
- [ ] Third-party code properly attributed
- [ ] License compliance verified
- [ ] Copyright notices updated (if applicable)
